author: rays5439
content: hey team, congrats on the successful Sepolia launch, got one question regarding some numbers shown on https://beaconcha.in/validators, it seems there has been a few validators already exited, just wonder if that's the case and if one can already signals intention to exit and go through the exit queue before mainnet fork. Thanks!

author: sproul
content:
yeah it has always been possible to exit, called a “voluntary exit”. Capella just means you get your ETH back after you do it

see e.g. Lighthouse’s docs on this <https://lighthouse-book.sigmaprime.io/voluntary-exit.html>

author: rays5439
content: does the exit queue process happen now as well? i.e., no need to wait for Capella
